attributes.action: Exceptional arrangements needed for overseas nurses working as HCA’s in UK
attributes.additional_details:
We call on NMC to facilitate their registration by verifying evidence of

1.) their overseas pre-registration nursing qualification being taught and examined in English, 
2.) UK employer reference confirming language proficiency 
OR
     having completed a bachelors or masters from UK
attributes.background: Many overseas qualified nurses have been employed in the UK healthcare sector private & NHS as HCA’s. Each of them have been practising in a totally English environment. NMC should incorporate exceptional arrangements, to facilitate their registration.

rejection.details: This petition calls on the Nursing and Midwifery Council, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.
